name: Blood-Orange Liqueur
recipeYield: Makes about 10 cups, or three 750-ml bottles
recipeIngredient: Two 750-milliliter bottles grappa or other 90-proof alcohol
1 blood orange, peel left on and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, combine the sugar and 3/4 cup water. Simmer until the sugar dissolves.

In a large, sterilized container, combine the sugar mixture, grappa and orange. Cover and allow to sit in a cool, dark place for 1 month. Strain into sterilized bottles and seal with sterilized corks or caps.
